txt.en:
'These hobbits are a terrible nuisance. They told us they would keep their appetites under control. Look at them now. It is all we can do to keep them out of the larder. I do not envy the challenge Velgerde has in keeping them out of the food stores and dishes the cooks will make for the event.

'This decision was not our wisest.

'I believe that Velgerd has devised a way to upset their stomachs long enough to allow cooks and assistants to make their deliveries.'
